section.name: Welcome to Wicket-Dojo
section.p: The powerful and easy-to-use Object-Orriented Web framework wicket meets Dojo, a javascript toolkit which let's you make your webapps even more useable, responsive, and functional. This includes graphical decorations, AJAX functionality, Dojo widgets such as Drag and Drop, inline edit, etc... and other javascript enhancements.
Download this release to see all interesting features or take a look at the live demo.

ul.li: Check the tutorials list (not yet ready... please be patient)

subsection.name: January 5, 2007 - Wicket-Dojo is not dead a new release with a lot of improvement comes out
subsection.p: After a year of hibernation, wicket contrib dojo awackes with a new release.

This project has been started by 2 students (see the weblog). They are now working on others stuffs.
Now we are two co-workers working on it
Jean Baptiste Quenot
Vincent Demay
Special thanks to eelco and igor who allow us to work on this project.

The first new Version is now available with a lot of features.
More than Validation or effects from last release, now you can find widgets such has
Suggestion List
Inline edit
Drag and drop
and friends...
Take a Look at the live exemple.
